explains: adj. 最终的，结局的；<古>有条件的

sentences.en: The village school may face eventual closure.
sentences.cn: 这所乡村学校可能最终会面临关闭。

sentences.en: It is impossible to predict what the eventual outcome will be.
There are many who believe that civil war will be the eventual outcome of the racial tension in the country.
sentences.cn: 有许多人认为内战将是该国种族关系紧张的最终结果。
